sentence.Network_en: The leading naturalist, Emile Zola, enunciated the philosophy of the new school.
sentence.Network_cn: 法国主要的自然主义者埃米尔·左拉阐明了这种新流派的基本原理.

sentence.Network_en: Emile wished on the morning star for a safe voyage.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱米对着晨星祈祷,希望旅途平安.

sentence.Network_en: Others dismissed it out of hand. Emile stuck to his story.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他人马上就摒弃了新石器之说, 而埃米尔却坚守自己的说法.
